alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:36PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Madison and northern Gallatin Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 435 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Harrison, or 27 miles northeast of Virginia City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Norris, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Trident, Church Hill, Willow Creek and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 278 and 314. Highway 191 between mile markers 77 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for south central and southwestern Montana.
